artist: Project Manager: The Minneapolis Handicraft Project WPA; Designer: E. Erickson; Maker: C. Hagen
creditline: Gift of Jeannine Bourdaghs and Versea Bourdaghs
description: light tan cloth block printed overall in purple, gold, green and orange; shields, floral designs and scrolls; four different designs; hanging tabs at top

title: Wall Hanging
